level.heading: Uniformity of application and construction.
level.text: This chapter shall be applied and construed as to effectuate its general purpose to make uniform the law with respect to the subject of this chapter among those states enacting it.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 3-160
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 3-160, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 41-101.

level.heading: Editor’s Notes
level.text: Uniform Law: This section is based upon § 40 of the Uniform Unclaimed Property Act (1981 Act).
